Hammond.Briar Ridge:
Briar Ridge is a gated, upscale residential community partly in Dyer and partly in Schererville, in Lake County, Indiana.


== Overview ==
Bordered on the south by 213th St, on the north by Main St, and on the west by Hart Ditch in a gated golf course neighborhood. Streets in Briar Ridge include: Ballybunion Ct, Killarney Dr, La Forestiere Ct, Portmarnock Ct, Royal Dublin Ln, Waterville Ct, La Hinch Ct, Tryall Ln, Perthshire Ln, Muirfield Dr, Rescobie Dr, Troon Ct, Turnberry Dr, St.
